description:
Keep road spray from following you home. Tipping the scales at a mere 64g, the Win Wing is a light and easy way to keep road sauce off your thighs, butt and back. With no tools needed for installation, it is simple to add this fender to your frame when you need it, and pop it off when you don’t.

  • Fits frames that don’t have the clearance for standard fenders
  • Works with tire widths up to 35mm
  • Doesn’t interfere with racks and saddle bags
  • Tool-free installation, nylon wishbone attaches via 2 polyurethane straps
  • Stealthy zip tie slots add a bit of security for long term installations
  • 3 different angles to fit different seat stay geometry
  • Includes transparent frame tape strips to protect your bike’s finish
  • Flexible recycled polypropylene fender blade won’t jam with rogue bits of nature
  • Dimensions: 375 x 85mm
name: Ass Savers Win Wing Road Mudguard
